title: Noam Chomsky labels Donald Trump a 'megalomaniac psychopath'
description:
Linguist Noam Chomsky says there is “too much competition” for who has been the worst US President during his 94 years.

He labels Donald Trump a “megalomaniac psychopath” who could bring disaster upon the world if re-elected.  

“If he (Donald Trump) runs again, it will be a disaster for the world,” Mr Chomsky told Sky News Australia host Piers Morgan. 

“He has two commitments; one commitment is to himself – the other commitment is to serve corporate power and great wealth. 

“He is a megalomaniac psychopath – all that concerns him is ‘me’.”
